Package net.dermetfan.gdx.physics.box2d

Interface WorldObserver.Listener

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorldObserver.Listener.Adapter, WorldObserver.UnexpectedListener
Enclosing class:
WorldObserver
public static interface WorldObserver.Listener
the listener notified by a WorldObserver
Since:
0.6.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  WorldObserver.Listener.Adapter
    A class that implements Listener.
